about_the_game:
Roll. Change. Conquer. Build your ultimate dice arsenal in this deckbuilding roguelike where every roll rewrites reality.

✨ WHAT MAKES IT UNIQUE

Your Luck = Your Weapon
Start with a simple D6, then break the rules:

  • 🎲 Reroll enemy stats mid-battle to weaken bosses,

  • 🎯 Steal digits from opponents to power up your own dice,

  • 💥 Stack modifiers like "All 3s become 5s" + "5s explode" = chaos!

  • ...

This isn’t RNG — this is strategy wearing a dice mask.

🔄 CRAFT UNBREAKABLE BUILDS

⚔️ 60+ Modifiers. Combine items, abilities, and wild events to bend the rules of probability, from game-breaking to hilariously risky:

  • "Blood Dice" – 6s deal self-damage but boost your next roll by +3.

  • "Chaos Gambit" – Shuffle all dice numbers every 5 turns.

  • "Merchant’s Curse" – Buy a lucky die for 10 HP… or sell a cursed relic to your enemy.

  • ...

🎭 CHARACTERS THAT REWRITE THE RULES

20+ Characters with distinct abilities and playstyles. Each hero transforms gameplay with unique mechanics:

  • 🧪 The Alchemist: Turn 6s into explosive potions or healing brews.

  • 🃏 The Gambler: Steal enemies’ numbers but risk losing it all on a bad roll.

  • 💀 The Necromancer: Resurrect foes as zombie allies – their dice rot over time.

  • ... +17 other heroes

✨ DICE × DICE

  • 👑 10 Bosses: From the Six-Hoarding Dragon to the Probability-Warping AI – each rewrites the rules of engagement.

  • 👾 30+ Enemies: Face Mimic Imitators (they copy your best combos), 6-Stealing Bankers, and Chaos-Worshipping Cultists.

  • 🌀 Endless Combinations: 1,000+ ways to break reality (and the game).

  • ⚡ 30+ Items: From cursed relics to reality-ripping dice – power-ups with a price.

❓ DARE TO ASK…

  • Can you beat a boss using THEIR OWN DICE?

  • Will you risk a 1 HP run for triple rewards?

  • Can you win without rolling a single die yourself?

Your choices rewrite reality. No luck – just genius.

short_description: Dice × Dice — a strategic roguelike where you rewrite dice rules! Craft insane combos, crush enemies via number manipulation, and outsmart bosses who adapt. Each run offers new tactics: steal 6s from dragons, turn 1s into explosions, and master chaos. Luck is your tool, not your sentence.
